name: Leccia - Luchador El Gringo - Pile Driver
additionalNotes:
After a relatively brief relationship, Sam Leccia has left his position at General Cigar Co. and will reportedly be taking his cigar brands with him. Leccia, known for his Leccia Black, Leccia White and Luchador brands, announced the news via a Facebook post on his personal page, which was later confirmed 
General Cigar acquired Leccia's cigar brands in 2014 shortly after the cigar conglomerate bought the Tora√±o Family Cigar Co., which was distributing them at the time. Leccia also joined General as a "cigar and blend specialist," and the company began distributing his Leccia White, Leccia Black and Luchador brands while he was there.
